Certainly, here is a draft proposal for a tiered package deal:

Dear [Client],

Thank you for considering my social media management services for your businesses. I believe that a tiered package deal would be the best option for you, as it allows you to choose the package that best suits your needs and budget.

I am pleased to offer the following three package options for your consideration:

1. Basic Package ($150 per business): This package includes the creation and scheduling of social media posts using the content provided by you, as well as the creation of compelling captions and the use of relevant hashtags. This package is ideal for businesses that already have a strong visual brand and simply need help with content creation and scheduling.
2. Advanced Package ($239.5 per business): This package includes all of the services offered in the Basic Package, as well as the creation and design of eye-catching thumbnails and the scheduling of your social media posts to maximize engagement and reach. This package is ideal for businesses that want a more comprehensive social media management solution.
3. Premium Package ($283 per business per month): This package includes all of the services offered in the Advanced Package, as well as social media automation for Messenger, Instagram, SMS, emails, and WhatsApp, the designing of regular social media posts, and copywriting. Additionally, this package includes website copywriting and optimization for SEO, which will help your business rank higher in search engine results and drive more traffic to your website. This package is ideal for businesses that want a complete social media and online marketing solution.

I hope that one of these packages meets your needs and helps your businesses thrive on social media. If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out. Thank you for your consideration.

Best regards,

[Your Name]
